Description: Head of Alexander the Great, wearing elephant's scalp and aegis, with horn of Zeua Ammon, right; dotted border. (obverse)
Athena Alkidemos standing, holding shield and spear, right; front, eagle, right; dotted border. (reverse)
Bibliographic references: SNG Copenhagen / Sylloge Nummorum Graecorum: The Royal Collection of coins and medals, Danish National Museum (43 vols) (Egypt:Ptolemies. 19) (type)
Exhibition history: 2023 4 May - 13 Aug, London, BM, G35, Luxury and Power: Persia to Greece
Associated names: Named in inscription & portrayed: Alexander the Great
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Mrs G E M Lewis
